ya5.3.4:4.1: ⇒ Yo dukkhasaccaṃ parijānāti so samudayasaccaṃ pajahitthāti?
ya5.3.4:5.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ pajahittha so dukkhasaccaṃ parijānātīti?
ya5.3.4:6.1: ⇒ Yo dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānāti so samudayasaccaṃ nappajahitthāti?
ya5.3.4:7.1: Arahā dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānāti, no ca samudayasaccaṃ nappajahittha.
ya5.3.4:7.2: Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti samudayasaccañca nappajahittha.
ya5.3.4:8.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṃ nappajahittha so dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānātīti?
ya5.3.4:9.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī samudayasaccaṃ nappajahittha, no ca dukkhasaccaṃ na parijānāti.
ya5.3.4:9.2: Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā samudayasaccañca nappajahittha dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti.
